article_title: Belmont Abbey grad seeks Senate seat
article_text:
By Michael Barrett

Posted Jan. 16, 2014 at 12:01 AM

Updated Jan 16, 2014 at 5:42 PM

article_metadata.description: Matt Arnold says his time as a Belmont Abbey College student played a key role in preparing him for an upcoming state Senate run.
article_metadata.author: Michael Barrett
